text:
Car or bus washers
employed by an interstate bus line, and engaged in work either at the terminal
or at the company garage, are engaged in work so closely related to the
movement of goods in interstate commerce as to be engagement in interstate
commerce.
html: Car or bus washers employed by an interstate bus line, and engaged in work either at the terminal or at the company garage, are engaged in work so closely related to the movement of goods in interstate commerce as to be engagement in interstate commerce.
